verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these תֹּלְד֥וֹת <S%H8435><s%> Now these [are] the generations עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> who [is] Edom

עֵשָׂ֛ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau לָקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָשָׁ֖יו <S%H802><s%> his wives מִבְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> of the daughters כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָדָ֗ה <S%H5711><s%> Adah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אֵילוֹן֙ <S%H356><s%> of Elon הַֽחִתִּ֔י <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָהֳלִֽיבָמָה֙ <S%H173><s%> and Aholibamah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter עֲנָ֔ה <S%H6034><s%> of Anah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter צִבְע֖וֹן <S%H6649><s%> of Zibeon הַֽחִוִּֽי׃ <S%H2340><s%> the Hivite
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּשְׂמַ֥ת <S%H1315><s%> And Bashemath בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <S%H3458><s%> Ishmael's אֲח֥וֹת <S%H269><s%> sister נְבָיֽוֹת׃ <S%H5032><s%> of Nebajoth

וַתֵּ֧לֶד <S%H3205><s%> bare עָדָ֛ה <S%H5711><s%> And Adah לְעֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> to Esau אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלִיפָ֑ז <S%H464><s%> Eliphaz וּבָ֣שְׂמַ֔ת <S%H1315><s%> and Bashemath יָלְדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רְעוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H7467><s%> Reuel

וְאָהֳלִֽיבָמָה֙ <S%H173><s%> And Aholibamah יָֽלְדָ֔ה <S%H3205><s%> bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [יעישׁ כ] (יְע֥וּשׁ <S%H3266><s%> Jehush ק) וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעְלָ֖ם <S%H3281><s%> and Jaalam וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֹ֑רַח <S%H7141><s%> and Korah אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> these [are] the sons עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יֻלְּדוּ־ <S%H3205><s%> which were born ל֖וֹ בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto him in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took עֵשָׂ֡ו <S%H6215><s%> And Esau אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָ֠שָׁיו <S%H802><s%> his wives וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֹתָיו֮ <S%H1323><s%> and his daughters וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all נַפְשׁ֣וֹת <S%H5315><s%> and all the persons בֵּיתוֹ֒ <S%H1004><s%> of his house וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְנֵ֣הוּ <S%H4735><s%> and his cattle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בְּהֶמְתּ֗וֹ <S%H929><s%> and all his beasts וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all קִנְיָנ֔וֹ <S%H7075><s%> and all his substance אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which רָכַ֖שׁ <S%H7408><s%> which he had got בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the country מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from the face יַעֲקֹ֥ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob אָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> of his brother

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> had become רְכוּשָׁ֛ם <S%H7399><s%> For their riches רָ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> were more מִשֶּׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> than that they might dwell יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not יָֽכְלָ֜ה <S%H3201><s%> could אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land מְגֽוּרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4033><s%> wherein they were strangers לָשֵׂ֣את <S%H5375><s%> not bear אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> them because מִקְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4735><s%> of their cattle

וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> Thus dwelt עֵשָׂו֙ <S%H6215><s%> Esau בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> Seir עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> [is] Edom

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These תֹּלְד֥וֹת <S%H8435><s%> And these [are] the generations עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> the father אֱד֑וֹם <S%H123><s%> of the Edomites בְּהַ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount שֵׂעִֽיר׃ <S%H8165><s%> Seir

אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> These [are] the names בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons עֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau's אֱלִיפַ֗ז <S%H464><s%> Eliphaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עָדָה֙ <S%H5711><s%> of Adah אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> the wife עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau רְעוּאֵ֕ל <S%H7467><s%> Reuel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בָּשְׂמַ֖ת <S%H1315><s%> of Bashemath אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> the wife עֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> of Esau

וַיִּהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אֱלִיפָ֑ז <S%H464><s%> of Eliphaz תֵּימָ֣ן <S%H8487><s%> were Teman אוֹמָ֔ר <S%H201><s%> Omar צְפ֥וֹ <S%H6825><s%> Zepho וְגַעְתָּ֖ם <S%H1609><s%> and Gatam וּקְנַֽז׃ <S%H7073><s%> and Kenaz

וְתִמְנַ֣ע ׀ <S%H8555><s%> And Timna הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become פִילֶ֗גֶשׁ <S%H6370><s%> was concubine לֶֽאֱלִיפַז֙ <S%H464><s%> to Eliphaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau's וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and she bare לֶאֱלִיפַ֖ז <S%H464><s%> to Eliphaz אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> Amalek אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> these [were] the sons עָדָ֖ה <S%H5711><s%> of Adah אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife עֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> Esau's

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And these [are] the sons רְעוּאֵ֔ל <S%H7467><s%> of Reuel נַ֥חַת <S%H5184><s%> Nahath וָזֶ֖רַח <S%H2226><s%> and Zerah שַׁמָּ֣ה <S%H8048><s%> Shammah וּמִזָּ֑ה <S%H4199><s%> and Mizzah אֵ֣לֶּ֣ה <S%H428><s%> These הָי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> these were the sons בָשְׂמַ֖ת <S%H1315><s%> of Bashemath אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife עֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> Esau's

וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הָי֗וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> And these were the sons אָהֳלִיבָמָ֧ה <S%H173><s%> of Aholibamah בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter עֲנָ֛ה <S%H6034><s%> of Anah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter צִבְע֖וֹן <S%H6649><s%> of Zibeon אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife עֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau's וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and she bare לְעֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> to Esau אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [יעישׁ כ] (יְע֥וּשׁ <S%H3266><s%> Jehush ק) וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעְלָ֖ם <S%H3281><s%> and Jaalam וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֹֽרַח׃ <S%H7141><s%> and Korah

אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These אַלּוּפֵ֣י <S%H441><s%> These [were] dukes בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons עֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אֱלִיפַז֙ <S%H464><s%> of Eliphaz בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> [son] of Esau אַלּ֤וּף <S%H441><s%> duke תֵּימָן֙ <S%H8487><s%> Teman אַלּ֣וּף <S%H441><s%> duke אוֹמָ֔ר <S%H201><s%> Omar אַלּ֥וּף <S%H441><s%> duke צְפ֖וֹ <S%H6825><s%> Zepho אַלּ֥וּף <S%H441><s%> duke קְנַֽז׃ <S%H7073><s%> Kenaz

אַלּֽוּף־ <S%H441><s%> Duke קֹ֛רַח <S%H7141><s%> Korah אַלּ֥וּף <S%H441><s%> duke גַּעְתָּ֖ם <S%H1609><s%> Gatam אַלּ֣וּף <S%H441><s%> [and] duke עֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> Amalek אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These אַלּוּפֵ֤י <S%H441><s%> these [are] the dukes אֱלִיפַז֙ <S%H464><s%> [that came] of Eliphaz בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> these [were] the sons עָדָֽה׃ <S%H5711><s%> of Adah

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> And these [are] the sons רְעוּאֵל֙ <S%H7467><s%> of Reuel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau's אַלּ֥וּף <S%H441><s%> duke נַ֙חַת֙ <S%H5184><s%> Nahath אַלּ֣וּף <S%H441><s%> duke זֶ֔רַח <S%H2226><s%> Zerah אַלּ֥וּף <S%H441><s%> duke שַׁמָּ֖ה <S%H8048><s%> Shammah אַלּ֣וּף <S%H441><s%> duke מִזָּ֑ה <S%H4199><s%> Mizzah אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These אַלּוּפֵ֤י <S%H441><s%> these [are] the dukes רְעוּאֵל֙ <S%H7467><s%> [that came] of Reuel בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> these [are] the sons בָשְׂמַ֖ת <S%H1315><s%> of Bashemath אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife עֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> Esau's

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> And these [are] the sons אָהֳלִֽיבָמָה֙ <S%H173><s%> of Aholibamah אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau's אַלּ֥וּף <S%H441><s%> duke יְע֛וּשׁ <S%H3266><s%> Jeush אַלּ֥וּף <S%H441><s%> duke יַעְלָ֖ם <S%H3281><s%> Jaalam אַלּ֣וּף <S%H441><s%> duke קֹ֑רַח <S%H7141><s%> Korah אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These אַלּוּפֵ֞י <S%H441><s%> these [were] the dukes אָֽהֳלִיבָמָ֛ה <S%H173><s%> [that came] of Aholibamah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter עֲנָ֖ה <S%H6034><s%> of Anah אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife עֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> Esau's

אֵ֧לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> These [are] the sons עֵשָׂ֛ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These אַלּוּפֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H441><s%> and these [are] their dukes ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> who [is] Edom ס

אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> These [are] the sons שֵׂעִיר֙ <S%H8165><s%> of Seir הַחֹרִ֔י <S%H2752><s%> the Horite יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> who inhabited הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land לוֹטָ֥ן <S%H3877><s%> Lotan וְשׁוֹבָ֖ל <S%H7732><s%> and Shobal וְצִבְע֥וֹן <S%H6649><s%> and Zibeon וַעֲנָֽה׃ <S%H6034><s%> and Anah

וְדִשׁ֥וֹן <S%H1787><s%> And Dishon וְאֵ֖צֶר <S%H687><s%> and Ezer וְדִישָׁ֑ן <S%H1789><s%> and Dishan אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These אַלּוּפֵ֧י <S%H441><s%> these [are] the dukes הַחֹרִ֛י <S%H2752><s%> of the Horites בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children שֵׂעִ֖יר <S%H8165><s%> of Seir בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> of Edom

וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children לוֹטָ֖ן <S%H3877><s%> of Lotan חֹרִ֣י <S%H2753><s%> were Hori וְהֵימָ֑ם <S%H1967><s%> and Hemam וַאֲח֥וֹת <S%H269><s%> sister לוֹטָ֖ן <S%H3877><s%> and Lotan's תִּמְנָֽע׃ <S%H8555><s%> [was] Timna

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children שׁוֹבָ֔ל <S%H7732><s%> of Shobal עַלְוָ֥ן <S%H5935><s%> [were] these Alvan וּמָנַ֖חַת <S%H4506><s%> and Manahath וְעֵיבָ֑ל <S%H5858><s%> and Ebal שְׁפ֖וֹ <S%H8195><s%> Shepho וְאוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H208><s%> and Onam

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And these [are] the children צִבְע֖וֹן <S%H6649><s%> of Zibeon וְאַיָּ֣ה <S%H345><s%> both Ajah וַעֲנָ֑ה <S%H6034><s%> and Anah ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עֲנָ֗ה <S%H6034><s%> this [was that] Anah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who מָצָ֤א <S%H4672><s%> that found אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֵּמִם֙ <S%H3222><s%> the mules בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness בִּרְעֹת֥וֹ <S%H7462><s%> as he fed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲמֹרִ֖ים <S%H2543><s%> the asses לְצִבְע֥וֹן <S%H6649><s%> of Zibeon אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children עֲנָ֖ה <S%H6034><s%> of Anah דִּשֹׁ֑ן <S%H1787><s%> [were] these Dishon וְאָהֳלִיבָמָ֖ה <S%H173><s%> and Aholibamah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter עֲנָֽה׃ <S%H6034><s%> of Anah

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And these [are] the children דִישָׁ֑ן <S%H1789><s%> Dishon חֶמְדָּ֥ן <S%H2533><s%> Hemdan וְאֶשְׁבָּ֖ן <S%H790><s%> and Eshban וְיִתְרָ֥ן <S%H3506><s%> and Ithran וּכְרָֽן׃ <S%H3763><s%> and Cheran
